categories: Category:Articles with an excess of redlinks
Category:Star Wars: Episode I Adventures novels

nodes.text: Episode I Adventures 4: Jedi Emergency was the fourth installment of Star Wars Episode I Adventures.
A young girl has been found who has the power to become a Jedi.
But an evil scientist doesn't want to let her go. And her home is under attack by Bartokk Assassins.
Yoda, Mace Windu, and the other Jedi must save her.
